mapper.update: update x_address set x_postaddress = #{xPostaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x_modify = #{xModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x_isdelete = #{xIsdelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x_postcode = #{xPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x_province = #{xProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x_city = #{xCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x_county = #{xCounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x_desc = #{xDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where x_userid = #{xUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select x_userid, x_postaddress, x_modify, x_isdelete, x_postcode, x_province, x_city, x_county, x_desc from x_address where x_userid = #{xUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select x_userid, x_postaddress, x_modify, x_isdelete, x_postcode, x_province, x_city, x_county, x_desc from x_address
